ygData.subject: RE: shadowmen?
ygData.msgSnippet: DOH!!!!! you turn in the mask, and i believe the globe of shadow, large shadow silk, a werebat wing to get the robe, you don t want to equip it. To me the mask
ygData.messageBody:
DOH!!!!! you turn in the mask, and i believe the globe of shadow, large
shadow silk, a werebat wing to get the robe, you don't want to equip it. To
me the mask was by far the longest i have had to camp for something (hadn't
camped for jboots). I still haven't seen the book of shadows dropped yet
though.

-----Original Message-----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan [mailto:trizzen@...]
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 10:24 AM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] shadowmen?


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>


>The hardest ones are the damn clerics,
>rarely there will be a spawn of 4 shadowmen on the
>left side of the spawn and
>once this weekend it spawned 4 clerics, well 3 of us
>nec's tried it with all of
>our pets and we all died and only killed 1 cleric,
>now that was
>embarassing

Amen. We had four necros with pets, and witnessed a
massive spawn. 2 clerics, necro and two warriors. They
wiped us out pretty quickly. We made the mistake of
takeing out the necro first thinking he was the most
powerful. The clerics kept him alive while the
warriors shredder our pets and ourselves. Nasty fight,
but fun.

>Finally i'm all dressed in black, got my mask of
>shadow
>that i had hunted for which probably took about 15hrs
>of playing time in nek forrest.

I managed to pickup a mask as well, but it would not
let me equip it. It said All/All and i am a dark elf
necro, so what am i missing?

Darkmoon Somberlight
